title: Truth Mosaic Exposed
outcome: Three days after the assemblies, Oksana Lintz discreetly releases the true historical BCI database to public assemblies. Citizens openly audit their own histories at the mural, uncovering evidence of systemic abuses and rare acts of mercy. The Directorate attempts to halt the public reckoning, but standoffs between citizens and authorities paralyze the Council and reshape the city's self-image.

events.description: Oksana Lintz releases full BCI archives to assembly leaders with unofficial approval. Crowd activity at the mural site grows and lines form for access terminals.
Citizen 'truth council' forms at the mural, openly cross-referencing system histories. Eyewitnesses recall injustices and official interventions never before revealed.
Emboldened citizens publish thousands of BCI case logs and data summaries. Council factions denounce the leaks, and Directorate initiates efforts to shut down mural access.
Large public standoffs erupt as citizens physically shield mural archives from Directorate teams. Live streams show emotional testimonials and Council hesitation.

With the truth council unbowed, Stenograd is transformed by civic debate—citizens begin proposing alternatives to BCI rule, and the Council is forced to suspend algorithmic governance citywide pending outcome of public negotiations.
